page.title: 15LESWALT YOUTH ASSOC's (2)
page.content: The 16th Wigtown Cub Scout Pack was founded in 1965 by its present leader, John Agnew. Organised by a committee and funded by subscription, it is open to boys from 8 to 11 years. Normal activities give the opportunity to gain badges and arrows, indoor and outdoor games and organised visits to, and from, other packs. Special activ- ities include bus and camping trips and visits to industrial sites and places of interest. The Leswalt Youth Club meets weekly in the Village Hall.Founded by Miss. Ferguson and Mr. Kyle in 1969, orgainised by a committee, it provides indoor and outdoor games and sports, opportunities for art and crafts for all children from 5 to 19. Funds are raised by subscription aided by an annual sponsored cycle run. The club has competed very successfully in
